snippet: Legal advocates said an announcement fueled hopes that the draconian system of labor camps, established in the 1950s, would be significantly modified.
abstract: China will begin overhauling its draconian system of labor camps, signaling incoming leadership's determination to alter one of government's more widely despised punishments for petty criminals, religious dissidents, petitioners and other perceived social irritants.
lead_paragraph: Legal advocates said an announcement fueled hopes that the draconian system of labor camps, established in the 1950s, would be significantly modified.
